description: From Czech and Slovak koruna; cognate with krone and German Krone. Doublet of corona, crown, krone, and krona.

nouns.description: koruna (plural korun or korunas or koruny)

entries.meaning: (historical) The currency of the former Czechoslovakia, divided into 100 hellers.
The currency of the Czech Republic, divided into 100 hellers.
The former currency of Slovakia, divided into 100 haliers.
